description: This file defines the BadgerThunderPlugin class, a minimal plugin skeleton for the WPEFramework Thunder environment. It declares plugin lifecycle methods, JSON-RPC endpoints, and plugin registration routines, serving as a starting point for extending plugin functionality related to Badger/Thor permissions.

classes.name: BadgerThunderPlugin
classes.description: A plugin class for WPEFramework Thunder, providing JSON-RPC methods for ping and permissions listing. Implements plugin lifecycle management and RPC registration.

methods.name: BadgerThunderPlugin
methods.description: Constructor, initializes plugin instance and registers JSON-RPC methods.

methods.name: ~BadgerThunderPlugin
methods.description: Destructor, cleans up and unregisters JSON-RPC methods.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Activates the plugin and registers RPC methods with the container.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Deactivates the plugin and unregisters RPC methods.

methods.name: Information
methods.description: Returns diagnostic information string for the plugin.

methods.name: endpoint_ping
methods.description: JSON-RPC method responding with 'pong' to a ping request.

methods.name: endpoint_permissions_listMethods
methods.description: JSON-RPC method returning list of available permission methods.
